title: "Ask Me This On 31st": S Jaishankar On His New Year's Resolution For 2026
content: External Affairs Minister S. Jaishankar shared his 2026 New Year resolution, dismissed any link to Donald Trump and also explained his unique sleep routine.

title: US Team Plans to Visit India Next Week For Trade Talks
content: A team of negotiators from the Trump administration led by Deputy US Trade Representative Rick Switzer plans to travel to India next week to continue talks on a trade agreement, according to a US official.

title: Centre Planning Big IndiGo Crackdown, Likely To Seek CEO Pieter Elbers' Removal: Sources
content: The government is planning to seek the removal of IndiGo CEO Pieter Elbers, sources have said after the airline's chaotic handling of the new flight duty rules led to mass cancellations and stranded thousands of passengers across the country.

title: Indian Student Dies In Massive New York House Fire
content: A 24-year-old Indian student in the US has died after suffering severe injuries in a house fire, according to the Indian mission in New York.

title: Lok Sabha Introduces Bill To Regulate Deepfake Content With Consent Rules
content: A Private Member's Bill seeking a clear legal framework for regulation of deepfakes has been introduced in Lok Sabha. The Regulation of Deepfake Bill aims to protect citizens by mandating prior consent from individuals depicted in deepfake content

title: Forced To Watch Each Other Die: New Details On Russian Millionaire's Murder
content: Chilling new details have emerged about the murder of Russian crypto millionaire Roman Novak and his wife, Ana, revealing how they were tortured before being murdered in the UAE last month.

title: Donald Trump Receives First FIFA Peace Prize: What It Is
content: FIFA president Gianni Infantino, a close associate of Trump, has previously said he believed Trump should have received the Nobel for his attempts to negotiate a Gaza ceasefire.

title: Madhya Pradesh Sees One Deadly Cattle-Related Accident Every Three Days: Data
content: In the last two years, 94 people have lost their lives in such accidents, according to data presented by the state government in the Assembly on Friday.

title: "Very Shocking": DK Shivakumar On Delhi Cops' Notice In National Herald Case
content: DK Shivakumar alleged harassment in the National Herald case investigation and claimed that attempts were being made to allegedly create confusion just to target Sonia Gandhi, Rahul Gandhi, and their supporters.

title: New York Woman Charged With Smuggling Indians Into US
content: A 42-year-old woman has been charged for her role in an international smuggling conspiracy under which individuals primarily from India were brought illegally to the US across the border from Canada.

title: Centre Caps Airfares To Prevent "Opportunistic Pricing" Amid IndiGo Crisis
content: The Civil Aviation Ministry on Saturday announced capping of airfares to control the surge in airline ticket prices following the massive delay and cancellation of all domestic flights of IndiGo.

title: "No Country Has Veto On Our Ties": S Jaishankar On Whether Putin Visit Irks US
content: Foreign Minister S Jaishankar has defended India's freedom of choice to choose its global partners, asserting that New Delhi's ties with Moscow had been the biggest and steadiest in a world fraught with geopolitical ups and downs.

title: IndiGo Crisis Live Updates: Hundreds Of Flights Cancelled Today
content: The cancellation and delay of all domestic flights of IndiGo departing from Delhi entered the fifth day on Saturday. The issue has affected tens of thousands of passengers who are worried about extended delays and soaring travel costs.

title: Assam Cops Wrap Up Zubeen Garg Probe, Will Submit Chargesheet Next Week
content: Assam's Criminal Investigation Department (CID) has wrapped up the investigation surrounding the death of popular singer Zubeen Garg.

title: Year-Ender 2025: Prominent Debutants In Indian Politics
content: Year 2025 saw quite a few elections, whether it was for Vice President or for Rajya Sabha or state Assembly elections or state by-elections. The year also saw numerous political debutants as well.

title: India-US Trade Deal Soon? S Jaishankar's "Extremely Judicious" Response
content: A trade deal between India and the US could become a reality soon, Foreign Minister S Jaishankar said on Saturday, warning that in diplomacy a turnaround is always possible.

title: Video: Ajit Pawar, Rival Nephew Shake A Leg To Marathi Song At Family Wedding
content: In a rare display of family camaraderie, political rivals Ajit and Rohit Pawar were spotted dancing together to the popular Marathi songZingaat.

title: "She Has To Make Up Her Mind": S Jaishankar On Sheikh Hasina's India Stay
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar addressed the matter of former Bangladeshi PM Sheikh Hasina's status in India, suggesting that her continued stay is largely a personal decision influenced by the "circumstances" that led her to the nation.

title: "Safest Bet Is Capability": S Jaishankar On Handling An Uncertain Future
content: For S Jaishankar, the best way to deal with an uncertain future is "capability," and that's the safest bet to have.

title: Singapore Envoy Attends Staff's Wedding Online As IndiGo Cancels Flights
content: Singapore High Commissioner Simon Wong virtually attended his staff member's wedding in Jharkhand after IndiGo flight disruptions prevented him from travelling.

title: Airfares skyrocket amid IndiGo crisis: Govt reimposes fare caps; airlines told to strictly comply
content: The government has reimposed airfare caps on airlines for the first time since Covid, citing unusually high ticket prices due to the IndiGo crisis. These caps aim to protect passengers from opportunistic pricing until IndiGo operations normalize, expected by December 15. The move comes as many passengers faced exorbitant fares after IndiGo cancellations.

title: 'Biryani for 40k’: Suspended TMC MLA lays ‘Babri Masjid’ foundation; heavy security posted
content: Suspended TMC MLA Humayun Kabir laid the foundation stone for a "Babri Masjid-style" mosque in Murshidabad, West Bengal, despite his party suspension and heightened security. The event, involving extensive arrangements and an expected turnout of nearly 3 lakh people, is seen as a significant show of strength for the MLA in the region.

title: 'Was distressed over financial issues': Engineer jumps to death in front of Bengaluru metro
content: Namma Metro's Purple Line services were disrupted for over an hour after a design engineer died by suicide on the tracks at Kengeri station. The incident, which occurred during peak morning hours, caused significant inconvenience to thousands of passengers. Police are investigating the incident, with preliminary reports suggesting depression as a possible motive.

title: Nvidia CEO to Cambridge students; ‘Strategy is choosing what not to do’
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, honored with the Hawking Fellowship, shared leadership insights at Cambridge, emphasizing strategic sacrifice and unwavering conviction. He revealed seeing Nvidia's future vision early, stressing the importance of gut-checking assumptions and learning from failure. Huang described the CEO role as a lifetime of sacrifice, inspiring others through example rather than seeking personal glory.

title: De Kock hits new landmarks: Overtakes Kohli, equals Sachin in top ODI records
content: This was de Kock’s seventh ODI hundred in just 23 innings against India. No player has scored more hundreds against India. He is now level with Sanath Jayasuriya, who also has seven but reached the mark in 85 innings. De Kock also moved level with AB de Villiers for the most ODI hundreds by a visiting batter in India.

title: India-US trade: Next round of talks to start from Dec 10
content: India and the US are set to hold crucial trade talks in New Delhi from December 10-12 to finalize the initial phase of a pact. This follows recent US tariffs on Indian goods. Both nations aim to resolve tariff issues and boost bilateral trade to $500 billion by 2030, addressing concerns over falling Indian exports to the US.

title: Turkey: 7 killed, 11 injured after intercity bus crashes into lorry; driver detained
content: An intercity bus collided with a lorry on a southern Turkish motorway early Saturday, resulting in at least seven fatalities and 11 injuries. The bus struck the rear of the stationary lorry, which had stopped due to a burst tyre. All victims were bus passengers and the lorry driver is in custody.

title: Laptop buying alert: Dell, Lenovo and top PC makers message to customers
content: Major PC makers Dell and Lenovo are set to hike laptop and desktop prices by 15-20% soon due to an unprecedented memory shortage. AI data center demand is driving up component costs significantly. This surge, impacting DRAM and NAND flash, could force buyers to pay more for devices, with shortages potentially lasting years.

title: Shubman Gill cleared to play T20I series vs South Africa
content: Shubman Gill had been included in the T20I squad subject to fitness and was required to undergo a full set of rehabilitation and skill-based Return To Play (RTP) protocols.  Gill's injury occurred due to a whiplash incident on the second day of the Kolkata Test, resulting in Gill being hospitalised for a couple of days and administered an injection.

title: Hong Kong fire: Unsafe contractor given 'clean record' before blaze that killed 159 - report
content: Homeowners in Hong Kong were misled about a contractor's safety record before a devastating fire. Documents reveal the firm blamed for the blaze, Prestige Construction, had a history of safety violations, despite assurances from an architectural consultant. Investigations are underway into manslaughter and corruption following the tragedy that claimed at least 159 lives.

title: ‘Metaverse’ budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion
content: Meta is reportedly planning to significantly cut its Metaverse budget by up to 30% for 2026, signaling a potential shift away from its virtual reality ambitions. This move follows substantial losses and a lack of consumer interest in its VR products. The company is now prioritizing its artificial intelligence initiatives.

title: 'This is harassment, it is our money': DK Shivakumar reacts to ED notice in National Herald case
content: Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar received a notice from Delhi Police's EOW seeking financial records related to donations to Young Indian. Shivakumar termed the summons "shocking," stating he'd already provided information to the ED and views it as harassment against Congress leaders. Investigators are probing fund sources and third-party instructions.

title: Delhi: How digital ghost twice haunted man accused of killing his mother
content: A matricide suspect, Animesh Jha, who fled to Nepal five years ago on pandemic-era bail, has been apprehended at the Indo-Nepal border. Jha, a software engineer, allegedly murdered his mother in 2017 during a drug-fueled argument over finances. He was tracked down through electronic surveillance and lured back to India.

title: Candace Owens slammed for ‘running scared’ from Charlie Kirk livestream
content: Candace Owens is facing criticism for contradicting herself. She publicly offered to debate Turning Point USA (TPUSA) leadership anytime, anywhere. However, when TPUSA scheduled a livestream to address her claims, Owens pushed back on the logistics. Critics accuse her of creating drama rather than accepting the challenge she initiated. The situation has become a test of consistency for the commentator.

title: Aryna Sabalenka & Georgios Frangulis net worth: Earnings, endorsements, business
content: Tennis star Aryna Sabalenka and her boyfriend, Oakberry founder Georgios Frangulis, are a financially successful couple. Sabalenka boasts a net worth in the high teens of millions from her WTA career and endorsements, while Frangulis's stake in his rapidly expanding açaí company places him in the multi-million-dollar range. Their combined wealth is estimated to be in the tens of millions.

title: NBA trade rumors: Warriors may re-sign $190M guard to help Stephen Curry
content: Golden State Warriors are reportedly considering a reunion with former star Klay Thompson, now with the Dallas Mavericks. Amidst organizational shifts in Dallas and the Warriors' ongoing search for consistent three-point shooting, a trade for Thompson is being discussed. His return could bolster Golden State's offense and recapture championship magic.

title: Two Telangana villages, two battles: Residents stuck in 40-year poll freeze
content: Gudem village has boycotted local elections since 1983 over ST reservations, claiming no such community resides there. This has led to severe underdevelopment, water scarcity, and depreciating land values. Despite pleas and even boycotting Lok Sabha polls, the issue remains unresolved, impacting hundreds of villagers who are denied opportunities and fair land prices.

title: KL Rahul's unique coin-toss hack hands Gautam Gambhir his first win
content: The crowd roared and a smiling KL Rahul elected to bowl in the deciding third match of the series, which is level at 1-1. India's players were quick to congratulate Rahul, who is leading the ODI team in place of the injured Shubman Gill.

title: Assam tea, Kashmiri saffron & more: What PM Modi gifted Putin — in pictures
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi presented Russian President Vladimir Putin with specially curated gifts showcasing Indian culture during his two-day visit for the 23rd India-Russia Annual Summit. The gifts included a Russian edition of the Srimad Bhagavad Gita, GI-tagged Assam tea, Kashmiri saffron, and a silver tea set, highlighting India's heritage and craftsmanship.

title: Tears and frustration at airports across India as IndiGo cancels 1,000+ flights
content: IndiGo cancelled over 1,000 flights, causing widespread travel chaos across India. The government has put new pilot duty time rules on hold and set up a committee to review the disruptions. Passengers faced significant delays, missed competitions, and lost luggage, with normal operations expected to resume between December 10-15.

title: 'Dhurandhar' ending explained: What is Ranveer’s actual name? Here’s what we know
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' has stormed the box office, opening to ₹27 crore and exceeding expectations. The film's post-credit scene reveals a revenge mission against ISI's Major Iqbal, confirming a Part 2 release on March 19, 2026, and hinting at further secrets.

title: 'Yessss!!!': KL Rahul breaks 20-game curse with epic toss celebration – watch
content: India won the toss and elected to field against South Africa in the third and final ODI of the series at the ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium in Visakhapatnam on Saturday. The last time India won the toss in an ODI was during the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 semi-final against New Zealand at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium.

title: ‘Dhurandhar’ box office collection : Ranveer Singh’s film crosses Rs 30cr mark
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' has stormed the box office, becoming the second biggest opener of 2025. The film crossed Rs 30 crore by its second day, surpassing the opening weekend collection of the previously successful 'Saiyaara'. Inspired by true events like the Kandahar Hijack and 26/11 attacks, the action drama features a strong ensemble cast.

title: Reverse kidney damage: A breakthrough treatment that may transform kidney treatment
content: A groundbreaking discovery offers hope for reversing kidney damage, challenging the notion that it's irreversible. Researchers found that blocking ceramides, fats linked to kidney cell injury, protected and restored normal function in animal trials. This breakthrough could shift kidney disease treatment from slowing decline to actively restoring health, potentially reducing the need for dialysis and transplantation.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Islam Makhachev as he targets UFC 170-lb title next
content: Conor McGregor eyes a UFC comeback in June 2025 at a White House event. He aims for Islam Makhachev's welterweight belt, seeking a historic triple crown. McGregor is training intensely. He also remains open to a fight with Michael Chandler. Contract talks are expected by February 2025. The UFC is finalizing plans for this significant return.

title: IndiGo cancellations: Foreigner loses cool, climbs atop counter at Mumbai airport — watch
content: Widespread IndiGo flight cancellations on Saturday left thousands of passengers stranded across India, leading to scenes of frustration and protests at airports. Despite the aviation regulator pausing recent flight duty time limitations, disruptions continued, impacting crucial travel plans for many, including a team selected for the Smart India Hackathon.

title: Carpool moment with PM Modi, banquet dinner & trade decisions — highlights from Putin’s visit
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin concluded his two-day state visit to India, marked by a warm reception from PM Modi and discussions on strengthening bilateral ties. Key outcomes included a new economic cooperation program aiming for $100 billion trade by 2030 and a focus on peace efforts in Ukraine.

title: 'Exceptional': SBI hails RBI's repo rate cut, Central bank played its part
content: The Reserve Bank of India cut the repo rate to 5.25% amid strong economic growth and exceptionally low inflation, a move hailed as exceptional by SBI Research. This decision, supported by a unanimous Monetary Policy Committee vote, aims to sustain India's economic momentum. The central bank anticipates continued growth and low inflation, though external factors pose potential risks.

title: Bengaluru fans unhappy with RCB chatter: Venkatesh Prasad
content: Venkatesh Prasad is contesting the KSCA polls on December 7 with his panel 'Team Game Changers', aiming to end a "25-year reign". The former India cricketer wants to address transparency and mismanagement in the cricket body, and has vowed to make all efforts for getting international cricket back to the Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.

title: 'It was never through effort': Gukesh reacts to Anish Giri's 'different person' remark
content: Dutch No. 1 Anish Giri described D Gukesh’s ability to switch into distinct “modes” depending on the situation, calling him a completely different person on and off the board. Gukesh later said on X that this trait is natural. With Giri already qualified for the 2026 Candidates, the two may meet sooner in the upcoming Global Chess League (GCL).

title: Day 5 of IndiGo turmoil: Over 400 flights cancelled across four major airports - top developments
content: IndiGo on Saturday cancelled over 400 flights across four major airports on Saturday due to ongoing pilot rostering issues, despite temporary relief from new duty rules. The airline has apologized, is processing refunds, and arranging support for stranded passengers. The Civil Aviation Minister has launched a formal probe into the disruptions.

title: Putin to Trump? Russia ready for ‘uninterrupted fuel shipments’ to India
content: Amidst US sanctions on Russian oil majors, President Putin has assured India of consistent energy supplies, including oil, gas, and coal. This comes as India faces US pressure over its crude oil trade with Russia.  Beyond fossil fuels, Russia is also deepening collaboration with India in nuclear energy, transport logistics, and advanced technology sectors.

title: UAE launches new one-step service to renew passport and emirates ID together
content: The UAE has launched a new one-step service allowing Emiratis to renew their passports and Emirates ID cards together through the UAEICP app. This unified process eliminates separate applications, reduces processing times by 50%, and cuts customer inquiries by 40%. Part of the “Zero Bureaucracy” initiative, it simplifies document management and improves efficiency for citizens and families.

title: Gurgaon hit-and-run: Businessman killed; 22-year-old unlicensed driver arrested
content: A 58-year-old cyclist was tragically killed in a hit-and-run on Akashneem Marg, Gurgaon. The driver, a 22-year-old unlicensed housekeeping staffer, borrowed a bouncer's car and struck the cyclist from behind before fleeing. CCTV footage aided police in identifying and arresting the driver, who now faces multiple charges.

title: 8 hours straight sleep vs. split sleep: Which works better for your body
content: New research suggests splitting sleep into night and daytime naps can boost memory and reduce sleep pressure, offering benefits comparable to continuous sleep. This biphasic approach provides flexibility for irregular schedules, enhancing cognitive function and alertness. Understanding your body's response is key to choosing the optimal sleep structure for well-being.

title: Putin promises non-stop energy, PM says Russia ties like pole star
content: India and Russia reaffirmed their strong ties, signing over a dozen agreements to boost economic partnership to $100 billion by 2030. Both nations committed to uninterrupted fuel shipments and discussed civil nuclear cooperation. Discussions also covered defense, manpower mobility, and India's UN Security Council bid, with leaders expressing satisfaction with the summit's outcomes.

title: Chaos at Bengaluru airport: Father says daughter needs sanitary pad; IndiGo gives no help
content: IndiGo flight cancellations have plunged Kempegowda International Airport into chaos, leaving hundreds of passengers stranded, hungry, and without basic facilities. Travelers faced a severe lack of essentials like sanitary pads and food, with some resorting to arduous bus journeys due to ongoing uncertainty. The situation highlights significant operational disruptions and passenger distress.

title: 'Insane': How Elon Musk reacted to EU's $140m fine on X & why was it penalised
content: Elon Musk denounced the EU's $140 million fine on X as "crazy" and "insane," criticizing the penalty for violating transparency rules under the Digital Services Act. Regulators cited deceptive design practices with the blue checkmark system and shortcomings in X's ad database. The ruling has drawn criticism from US officials who view it as an attack on American tech platforms.

title: Bidaai fame Sara Khan ties the knot as per Hindu rituals
content: Newlyweds Sara Khan and Krish Pathak celebrated their Hindu wedding on December 5, following a court marriage in October. The couple, who met on a dating app a year ago, hosted a reception in Mumbai attended by friends and family. Sara looked radiant in a red lehenga, while Krish complemented her in a black sherwani.

title: Airport chaos: India’s World Cup winner stranded for 12 hours; slams IndiGo
content: IndiGo faces widespread passenger anger and flight disruptions due to new pilot rest regulations. Thousands were stranded, including cricketer Madan Lal, as over 1,000 flights were cancelled. The airline admitted to planning gaps and expects full normalisation between December 10 and 15.

title: Bengal: Suspended TMC MLA to lay 'Babri Masjid' foundation stone in Murshidabad;
content: Murshidabad braces for a tense Saturday as suspended TMC MLA Humayun Kabir plans to inaugurate a structure named "Babri Masjid."  Authorities have deployed over 3,500 security personnel following a Calcutta High Court directive to prevent communal unrest. Kabir insists the event will be peaceful, focusing solely on religious recitation, while the TMC denies involvement, alleging a political conspiracy.

title: ‘Babri’ event row: Calcutta HC orders Bengal govt to pull out all stops; beef up security
content: Calcutta High Court has ordered the Bengal government to prevent communal unrest in Murshidabad's Beldanga ahead of a suspended TMC MLA's controversial "Babri Masjid" foundation-laying ceremony on December 6.  Authorities have deployed significant security forces to maintain law and order, with the MLA proceeding with arrangements despite the court's directive.

title: Travis Kelce’s candid comments on Taylor Swift spark fresh future speculation
content: Travis Kelce recently spoke about his trip to Lake Como with Taylor Swift. He described the beautiful scenery and the warmth of the local people. Kelce expressed his joy and wonder at the experience, finding a new appreciation for life's pace. George Clooney also joined the conversation, sharing his own fondness for the Italian region.

title: CFP chaos scenarios for every league and what to watch in nine conference titles
content: Bill Connelly looks at key angles for all nine games -- and why the playoff committee could get a headache.

title: OKC rolls to 22-1 behind SGA's 33 in 3 quarters
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points, stretching his 20-point streak to 95 straight games, and the Thunder stomped the Mavericks 132-111 for their 14th straight win.

title: Penn State hires Cyclones' Campbell as new coach
content: Penn State named Iowa State coach Matt Campbell as the school's head football coach, the school announced Friday.

title: Schottenheimer: Will talk to Pickens about post
content: Cowboys coach Brian Schottenheimer said he will have a conversation with George Pickens about the wide receiver's social media post, which he has since deleted, in response to criticism he received from former All-Pro cornerback Richard Sherman.

title: 'No heart': Ex-star Cousins rips UK after ugly loss
content: Former Kentucky star DeMarcus Cousins didn't hold back on his opinion on the Wildcats after their 35-point loss to No. 11 Gonzaga on Friday night, saying the team "has no heart."

title: On Wilt's heels, Durant 8th ever to hit 31K points
content: Rockets star Kevin Durant, who entered Friday as the NBA's No. 8 all-time leading scorer, reached the 31,000-point milestone in the first quarter against the Suns.

title: Poch: USMNT can't be complacent after WC draw
content: USMNT coach Mauricio Pochettino said his objective over the next six months is to continue to improve the squad and "show full respect" for its World Cup group stage opponents.

title: Cool it! JMU AD scolds fans for throwing snowballs
content: James Madison athletic director Matt Roan used the public-address microphone to implore Dukes fans to stop throwing snowballs onto the field during the Sun Belt Conference championship game.

title: ↔️ Olney and Passan: MLB free agency intel
content: Here's our latest intel heading into the MLB winter meetings, starting with the slugger who holds the key to the offseason.

title: 2026 men's World Cup predictions: Group by group takeaways, must-see games
content: The draw is complete for the 2026 World Cup! What are the top matches to watch, and how will it all go down? We asked ESPN's writers to break down each group, highlight the storylines and make their predictions.

title: 10 NFL veterans who could unexpectedly be on the move this offseason: Surprise cut, trade candidates
content: Would the Eagles trade A.J. Brown in the offseason? Could the Ravens face salary cap decisions on two stars? Is Kyler Murray's time in Arizona running out?

title: Our guide to every Week 14 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
content: Shedeur Sanders vs. Cam Ward? Joe Burrow vs. Josh Allen? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 14 game.

title: Barnwell's end of the year prove-it list: 17 coaches and players with something at stake
content: Kenneth Walker III is among those with a lot to gain -- or lose -- over the season's final five weeks.

title: The old, struggling Clippers have options -- none of them good
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst surveyed the league on LA's next steps. Three difficult paths emerged.

title: This East lead hasn't come easy for the Pistons' young core
content: With every win, Detroit and its young core are moving further away from the dregs of a grueling rebuild.

title: Myles Garrett's journey to the NFL sack record: 'It is written'
content: Four sacks shy of making NFL history, the Cleveland Browns veteran is among the all-time great pass rushers.

title: Indiana freshman defies death, makes NCAA volleyball tournament
content: Toxic shock syndrome nearly killed Charlotte Vinson. Now she's hoping to help Indiana advance at the NCAA tournament.

title: Why are so many NHL games going to overtime? Five theories from players, coaches, execs
content: Through 425 games, 27.3% have gone past regulation. If that holds, it would be the highest rate since 2005-06.

title: Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, each team's most intriguing December game
content: The Capitals, Penguins and Flyers are the big risers this week, with the Ducks, Devils and Mammoth sliding.

title: 😡 Why Ole Miss finally had enough of Lane Kiffin
content: How the long courtship of the Rebels coach finally came to a head, amid secret meetings and middle fingers.

title: ↔️ What could Bucks get in a Giannis trade?
content: Giannis paired with Steph Curry? Kevin Durant? Victor Wembanyama?! NBA insiders break down five deals the Bucks could consider.

title: 🕚 Big Ben, Harrison call for Tomlin-Steelers split
content: Two Steelers legends have joined the chorus of voices calling for the franchise to move on from Mike Tomlin, with Ben Roethlisberger even suggesting that Tomlin is a good fit for the vacant Penn State job.

title: 🏀 Clippers abruptly sever ties with Chris Paul
content: Chris Paul, one of the greatest players in Clippers franchise history, posted an Instagram story a little before 3 a.m. ET Wednesday that he had just learned he was being sent home to Los Angeles from Atlanta.

title: ⚾ Ranking top 25 MLB offseason trade candidates
content: From All-Star outfielders to elite aces, here are the big names your team could be targeting this winter.

title: MLS Cup in Miami is all about Messi. Can Müller, Vancouver crash the party?
content: It's fitting that MLS Cup takes place on the same weekend as Miami's art fair, as old masters Lionel Messi and Thomas Müller prepare to face off.

title: Why team-provided housing has become a flashpoint
content: As both sides continue negotiations ahead of the Jan. 9 deadline, housing emerged as an issue in the latest proposal.

title: The 30 best MMA fighters under 30 in 2025
content: From top stars Ilia Topuria and Dakota Ditcheva to rising contenders Joshua Van and Natalia Silva, ESPN ranks the top 30 fighters under age 30.

title: Power Rankings: Michigan leaps to No. 1, plus 5 new faces
content: The Wolverines had perhaps the best Feast Week to take them over Arizona and Purdue in a roller-coaster No. 1 race.

title: Cena to face Gunther in final match, 'Terror Twins' are back
content: Friday's 'SmackDown' featured 'The Last Time Is Now' tournament final, a Damien Priest and Rhea Ripley reunion, and more.

content: If bye weeks or injuries have you seeking lineup help, consider the Jaguars' passing game and Titans defense.

content: Steve Alexander highlights fantasy basketball names trending upwards or downwards, with key takeaways for each.

content: It's Friday and a full weekend of action awaits across the soccer calendar as Julien Laurens picks out the best games ahead in Europe.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona eye Inter's Lautaro Martínez in striker search
content: Barcelona have renewed their interest in Inter Milan's Lautaro Martínez in their hunt for a new striker. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: F1 title contenders: How they got here and who's bound for glory in Abu Dhabi
content: For the first time since 2010, more than two drivers have a shot at the title in the season finale, so how did the championship protagonists get here?

title: President’s banquet dinner for Putin: Jhol momo, saffron pulao, bharwan aloo & more; full menu
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." title: Warangal MP Kadiyam Kavya introduces two landmark bills for Women’s welfare in Lok Sabha
content: One Bill places a statutory obligation on all workplaces to provide compulsory menstruation-related facilities; the second Bill seeks immediate government intervention for single women, widows, and women in distress

title: Job aspirants to participate in padayatra in Dharwad on December 8
content: They are demanding immediate steps to fill up various vacant posts in different government departments

title: Israeli defence firm says it plans to supply first batch of LMGs to India early next year
content: Shuki Schwartz, CEO of Israel Weapon Industries (IWI), also said that his firm is currently collaborating with various agencies within India’s Ministry of Home Affairs to market their products

title: Simplification of customs will be next big reform, says Finance Minister
content: The announcements to this effect can be made in the upcoming Budget, likely to be presented on February 1

title: Sana Shaheen talent search exam for class 10 students in Karnataka on December 7
content: The examination is for class 10 students who want to pursue education in various streams in Sana Shaheen group of institutions

title: Sad that Hindus have to seek judicial interventions to practice their faith: Pawan Kalyan
content: “We secured the right, but lost the ritual. This repeated, systemic denial is why a time has come to demand more than just court victories. We need the Sanatana Dharma Raksha Board that enables devotees to actively manage temples and religious affairs on their own,” the Deputy Chief Minister stated

title: U.P. Govt to build protective walls around Ambedkar statues: CM Adityanath
content: He also said that the government will complete connecting every slum, Dalit settlement, Scheduled Caste settlement and tribal settlement with proper connectivity, if any areas are still left unconnected

title: T.N. CM Stalin flags off relief materials to cyclone-hit Sri Lanka
content: According to a press release, the relief materials were mobilised through multiple departments of the Tamil Nadu government

title: Battle against communal forces spewing hatred will continue: Mamata Banerjee
content: Mamata Banerjee's comment comes on the day when suspended Trinamool Congress MLA Humayun Kabir was set to lay the foundation stone for the construction of ‘Babri-style’ mosque in Murshidabad district

title: Arunachal Governor’s residence renamed ‘Lok Bhavan’
content: The name change was implemented following a communication from the Union Ministry of Home Affairs and the direction of the Governor

title: Bomb threat emails disrupt three flights to Hyderabad in 12 hours; one flight turns back mid-air
content: Following a complaint by the airport authorities, the RGIA police booked a case and launched an investigation into the source of the emails.

title: Passengers stranded at Hyderabad airport as IndiGo cancellations continue
content: Around 69 flights were cancelled at Rajiv Gandhi International Airport, including 43 departures and 26 arrivals

title: No basis for communal tension claims at Thirupparankundram: T.N. BJP chief Nainar Nagenthran
content: Speaking to reporters in Chennai, Mr. Nagenthran said: “The dargah administrators had not objected to lighting the lamp on the deepathoon and therefore, there was no reason to suggest that communal unrest would occur in Thirupparankundram.”

title: Indian student dies after suffering severe injuries in house fire in U.S.
content: Sahaja Reddy Udumala, who was pursuing a Master’s degree in Albany, New York, succumbed to severe burn injuries affecting nearly 90% of her body

title: IndiGo flight disruptions Day 5: Centre imposes caps on ‘unusually high fares’, orders to complete passenger refunds by December 7
content: As disruptions persist, the Ministry of Civil Aviation intervenes to stabilise soaring ticket prices and ensure timely refunds for affected passengers, following the cancellation of over 400 flights by the airline amid ongoing operational challenges

title: INDIA bloc strong; not aware of any meeting between Praveen Chakravarty and Vijay: T.N. Congress chief
content: “I have not received any communication from the national leadership about Praveen Chakravarty meeting Vijay,” K. Selvaperunthagai said

title: Southern Railway announces special trains to clear rush amid flight disruptions
content: Southern Railway also said that one additional AC three-tier coach will be provided on certain long-distance trains

title: State set to host Telangana Rising Global Summit 2025 from December 8
content: On December 9, the State government will unveil the Telangana Rising 2047 Vision Document, outlining the roadmap to transform Telangana into a $3 trillion economy by 2047

title: Babri Masjid demolition: A collection of stories from The Hindu
content: On the 33rd anniversary of the mosque demolition, we revisit the watershed moment and its legal aftermath through reports, eyewitness accounts and opinion pieces published in The Hindu over the years

title: New York woman charged with smuggling individuals from India into U.S.
content: Stacey Taylor of Plattsburgh, New York, is charged with conspiring with others to engage in alien smuggling and four counts of alien smuggling for profit

title: Babri Masjid demolition: New mosque project in Ayodhya tentatively set for April 2026 rollout
content: Having submitted all the “necessary details” to the Centre for securing FCRA clearance, the Indo-Islamic Cultural Foundation is now anxiously hoping for a positive outcome by the “year-end or early next year”

title: IndiGo flight disruptions Day 5: airline cancels over 400 flights from four major airports including Delhi, Mumbai on Dec. 6
content: 42 flights cancelled at Pune airport; IndiGo  announced resumption of nine of its 11 flights from Jammu Airport, but cancelled seven flights from Srinagar

title: IFFK 2025: Nishanth Kalidindi’s ‘Theatre’ explores the fragile world of Indianostrum and indie cinema
content: After its IFFR Rotterdam premiere, Nishanth Kalidindi’s ‘Theatre’, inspired by Puducherry’s Indianostrum experimental troupe, comes to Kerala

title: Minister Nara Lokesh stole the show during Bhamini tour
content: CM Chandrababu Naidu mentioned Nara Lokesh’s struggle to bring reforms in the education sector, his studies at Stanford University, and his ideas for the improvement of academic standards of children studying in government schools

title: Webinar examining binge behaviours and addictive patterns to be held on December 7
content: The session will explore the causes of addictive patterns, especially around food, including cravings, emotional triggers, and hard-to-break habits. It will also offer practical tools for everyday life and guidance for families to provide support

title: Maharashtra teachers hold Statewide strike over TET norms, Govt. resolution on student-teacher ratio
content: Strike by 1.8 lakh teachers across Maharashtra shuts most schools as 35 unions demand rollback of GR on student-teacher ratio, TAT norms, and relief from non-academic duties

title: Kerala HC restrains police from arresting MLA Rahul Mamkootathil till December 15 in rape case
content: In his bail plea, Palakkad MLA contended that the allegations against him in FIR did not fall under the definition of rape. Mamkootathil said he was ready to explain every circumstance of the allegations before police, if given an opportunity, without fear of arrest

title: Jaishankar to be chief guest at inaugural ceremony of UNESCO meet on protecting intangible heritage
content: He was interacting with reporters ahead of the 20th session of the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage (ICH) will take place from December 8 to 13 at the Red Fort

title: Mahaparinirvan Diwas: Central Railway restricts platform ticket sales at 13 stations
content: It clarifies that the persons accompanying aged persons, senior citizens, ailing persons, children, illiterate persons and women passengers unable to fend for themselves will be able to buy platform tickets

title: IndiGo flights begin to depart from Chennai airport, but spate of cancellations continues
content: Delays persisted, but from 3 a.m. onwards, flights to cities including Pune, Ahmedabad, Guwahati, Bhubaneswar, Jaipur, Coimbatore, and Kochi departed from the city airport

title: Suspended TMC MLA Humayun Kabir lays foundation stone for ‘Babri Masjid-style’ mosque in Bengal’s Murshidabad
content: Humayun Kabir, who was suspended from TMC earlier this week for what the party described as indulging in “communal politics”, had announced the foundation ceremony earlier this month

title: Chander Kunj Army Towers resident files contempt petition in Kerala HC against Ernakulam Collector for alleged non‑compliance
content: Alleged non-compliance with court verdict regarding evacuation, demolition, and reconstruction of the twin towers

title: Bold and brave, a tribute to armed forces heroes of Telangana
content: Book titled ‘Bold & Brave’ highlights heroic deeds of Telangana’s gallantry awardees whose courage spans battlefields, disasters and decades of service, and honours their sacrifice while inspiring future generations to embrace the armed forces with pride and unwavering spirit

title: Former Osmania University Vice Chancellor D.C. Reddy no more
content: Under Mr. Reddy, the university saw several academic reforms, including the introduction of semester system in postgraduate courses and administrative development

title: Karnataka leads in solarising public health facilities, 3,600 centres adopt solar power under Saura Swasthya initiative
content: The project is expected to benefit more than three crore rural residents by enabling uninterrupted power supply to government hospitals

title: Electric tractor mela showcases clean, low-cost farm mechanisation in Karnataka
content: A key feature was the launch of the NRDC’s report, Powering Agriculture, which claims that electric tractors offer up to 80% lower operating costs, 50% lower ownership costs, and significant health benefits for farmers

title: Mahaparinirvan Diwas: PM Modi, Rahul Gandhi, other leaders offer tributes to Ambedkar on his death anniversary
content: The Congress, on its official X handle, paid tributes to Ambedkar and said he “empowered us with the strength of the Constitution, granting us the right to equality and justice”

title: Kerala local body polls: Delimitation redraws Alappuzha district’s political battleground
content: Beyond vote share trends lie regional issues, including growing disenchantment among paddy farmers and fears of displacement over the coastal highway project, that have the potential to change political ground

title: Kerala local body polls: Land crunch shrinks Munnar’s ward count after delimitation
content: Absence of land for house construction has resulted in families shifting to nearby panchayats, which has led in the ward numbers decreasing to 20 from 21 after delimitation

title: Kerala local body polls: LDF seeks mandate with measured confidence amid political crosswinds
content: Facing both achievements and controversies, the LDF approaches the local body elections seeking momentum for a third term in Kerala. While its decade-long welfare and development record anchors the campaign, internal frictions, high-profile cases, and shifting community dynamics shape a complex political terrain.

title: Maharashtra installs over 45,000 solar agricultural pumps in a month, claims world record
content: Maharashtra has so far installed 7.47 lakh solar pumps in the State and targets to set up a total of 10.45 lakh pumps

title: India weighs greater phone-location surveillance; Apple, Google and Samsung protest
content: India’s government is reviewing a telecom industry proposal to force smartphone firms to enable satellite location tracking that is always activated for better surveillance

title: DRDO hands over seven technologies developed under tech development fund to armed forces
content: The Committee undertook detailed discussions on a wide spectrum of project proposals and approved 12 new projects spanning across strategic, aerospace, naval and electronic warfare technologies, the ministry said

title: At least five killed, seven injured as car rams stationary vehicle near Tamil Nadu’s Keelakarai
content: A DMK functionary was among the deceased; a senior police officer said his vehicle crashed into an A.P. registration vehicle, which was parked in front of a hotel

title: Gujarat farmer distress: Where cotton clouds hang heavy
content: Following heavy rainfall in October and the subsequent drop in the price of cotton, six farmers have died by suicide in Gujarat. The Union government’s decision to allow duty-free cotton imports has only added to their woes. A.M. Jigeesh reports on how farmers in Gujarat’s cotton belt are calling for government intervention

title: Seema Punia gets 16-month ban for failing dope test
content: Seema Punia's suspension came into force on November 10 — the date of the decision by the Anti-Doping Disciplinary Panel (ADDP) — as per the updated list of dope offenders by the National Anti-Doping Agency (NADA)

title: Pressure mounts on Raj Bhavan to grant age relaxation to job aspirants in Jammu and Kashmir
content: Protests are being held by aspirants under the open merit category, demanding an increase in the current upper age limit from 32 to 37

title: Delhi University law student stabbed to death in south Delhi's Sangam Vihar; 2 held
content: Irshad, a first-year LLB student at Delhi University's Campus Law Centre, had multiple stab injuries, the police said.

title: Prasar Bharati signs MoUs with Russian media organisations
content: The organisations include Joint Stock Company Gazprom-media Holding; National Media Group, BIG ASIA Media Group, ANO TV-Novosti, and TV BRICS

title: International tiger trafficker held by M.P. tiger strike force from Sikkim
content: Yangchen Lachungpa (44), wanted under an INTERPOL Red Notice and involved in alleged trafficking of tiger body parts, was held from Lachung in North Sikkim on December 2, based on intelligence inputs and coordinated ground action

title: Debutant faces veterans in Ponnurunni East poll battle
content: LDF candidate Beena Divakaran, though a newcomer, is confident of the dominance of the front in the division where it has not tasted defeat in over four decades; three-time councillor Sunitha Dixon, BJP candidate, and UDF’s Jain Gray are her opponents

title: Manipur’s banned outfits warned against disrupting peace
content: A coalition of five armed groups threatened people who attended the recently concluded Sangai Festival with punitive action

title: Ernakulam reports highest number of influenza infections in Kerala
content: A total of 340 cases and two deaths, one each in Thiruvananthapuram and Malappuram, were reported in November

title: Path paved to link India’s skill base with Russia’s demand for labourers
content: Moscow is reported to need 5,00,000 semi-skilled workers; a formal agreement aims to facilitate safe mobility

title: Surprise inspections in Education Department offices in Bengaluru reveal computers, UPS units, and LED smart TVs were overpriced
content: During video calls with school headmasters, Lokayukta teams found that headmasters were not present during school hours

title: GHMC reviews air quality measures in city NCAP meeting
content: Key measures include expanding TGSRTC electric bus fleet on high-pollution routes, promoting electric three-wheelers, tightening pollution-under-control compliance for older vehicles, improving pedestrian infrastructure

title: India-Russia friendship remains steady like the pole star, says PM
content: The Russian President is on a two-day visit; PM signals that energy ties will continue as a “strong and vital pillar” of the partnership, despite Western opposition; 16 MoUs signed; PM announces free e-tourist visas for Russians

title: Mobile sanitation vehicle for police personnel launched in Bengaluru
content: The vehicles will feature separate washrooms for male and female police officers, exterior CCTV coverage, GPS tracking, and an LED display carrying road safety messages

title: Adani coal mine: Madhya Pradesh Congress MLAs protest felling of nearly 6 lakh trees in Singrauli
content: Minister of State for Forest Dilip Ahirwar says trees are being cut as per rules of the Centre and State, and that the same number of trees are being planted at different locations

title: As NC marks 120th birth anniversary of Sheikh Abdullah, no statement from J&K  Lieutenant Governor
content: Sheikh Abdullah founded the National Conference and was a former CM of J&K; L-G’s office usually issues statements on anniversaries of major public figures; scrapped move to declare holiday on anniversary

title: France’s Knight of the Order of Arts and Letters award to Ravi Deecee
content: The Ambassador of France to India confers the insignia of the award on the publisher and managing director of DC Books

title: Thirupparankundram row: Madras HC to hear appeals against Single Bench order on December 12
content: Appellants say the Single Bench failed to appreciate that for over 150 years, the Mahadeepam was lit only at the Uchipillaiyar temple mandapam area and never at the deepathoon

title: DMK, BJP members face off in Lok Sabha over Karthigai Deepam ritual at  Thirupparankundram temple
content: DMK leader T.R. Baalu accuses the BJP of trying to “ignite communal tensions” in Tamil Nadu, while Union Minister of State for Parliamentary Affairs L.  Murugan  alleges that the State government is denying devotees their right to worship

title: High cost of infertility treatments puts financial strain on couples: ICMR-NIRRCH study
content: According to the study, average out-of-pocket expenditure for one IVF cycle was upward of ₹1 lakh in both private and public hospitals

title: Women Safety Wing signs two MoUs to expand youth-led safety initiatives
content: Two partnerships aimed at strengthening community safety, youth leadership and gender-sensitisation programmes across the State

title: Calls grow for platform screen doors in metro stations, but rollout on existing routes faces cost and engineering setbacks
content: In February 2024, BMRCL installed metal railings along parts of the interchange platforms to limit track access. The corporation has since been studying the effectiveness of these installations, especially at high-traffic stations

title: Madras High Court restrains release of Nandamuri Balakrishna-starrer Akhanda 2
content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and C. Kumarappan grant the interim injunction following a monetary dispute between the production firm 14 Reels Plus LLP and Eros International

title: Kharge, Rahul not invited to Putin banquet: Congress
content: Shashi Tharoor makes it to the guest list as chairman of the Parliamentary Committee on External Affairs

title: Centenarian doctor donates ₹3.4 crore to AIIMS Bhubaneswar for cancer research
content: Professor K. Laxmi Bai’s contribution will create a corpus fund to support gynaecological oncology research and preventive care

title: 2026 recruiting class rankings: USC secures its No. 1 spot
content: USC has put itself in position to snap the five-cycle streak of SEC teams finishing with the No. 1-ranked class . some programs, including the no. 1 overall player, Lamar Brown, remain unsigned . there are still questions to be answered and opportunities to make a move in the 2026 class rankings .

title: MLS Cup preview: Messi's Miami has too much momentum for Caps to stop
content: 'Futbol Americas' team react to inter Miami's 5-1 win over new york city . MLS Cup: Inter Miami vs. the Vancouver whitecaps . the event marks the first time Lionel Messi & Co. have had an opportunity to secure the piece of silverware that the south Floridians have craved .

title: Want a Kalen DeBoer 'Black Hoodie of Death'? Good luck
content: "Excuse me," a woman says as she sifted through the endless round racks of Alabama Crimson Tide apparel . "i was hoping to buy him one of those Coach DeBoer Black Hoodies of Death," she says . all those stores do have plenty of something similar .

title: Ranking Saturday's fights: Roach-Cruz, Foster-Fulton, more
content: lamont Roach and Isaac "Pitbull" Cruz fight for vacant WBC interim title at 140 pounds . sportsmail runs through the best fights to watch this weekend, from San Antonio to Monte Carlo to the gold coast in Queensland, Australia . a rematch with Gervonta "Tank" Davis failed to happen .

title: Does Kirby Smart have an Alabama problem?
content: this season's matchup will fall under the "both" category, marking the fourth time in ten years that the Crimson Tide and Bulldogs have met in Atlanta to determine the conference's champion . it has also resurfaced a fascinating trend: Georgia coach Kirby Smart's struggles to overcome Alabama .

title: Who has the most work to do? Where all 30 teams stand ahead of winter meetings
content: the focus is shifting to every team's retooling effort for 2026 . it's going to have a tough act to follow . the heavy lifting of this hot stove season still lies ahead . for now, we'll check in with our first offseason stock watch .

title: Baker staying put as LSU defensive coordinator
content: Blake Baker is remaining with the program, coach Lane Kiffin says . he is expected to receive a revised contract and a raise . the 43-year-old is in his second stint at LSU after coaching the team's linebackers .

title: How the U.S. matches up against group stage foes
content: usmNT have been handed a favourable draw with their opponents in world cup group d . we know who, where and when the tournament's hosts will play . there's a chance that the U.S. will end up in a group with three teams it has already played in 2025 .

title: How the conference championship results affect the playoff: Tulane finishes the job
content: the no. 20 Green Wave dismantled no. 24 North Texas . the committee will watch the group of 5 conference championship games . it will determine its five highest-ranked conference champions . this is the committee's fourth-highest conference champion .

title: New NFL draft rankings: Miller stacks the top 50 prospects on his board
content: Dante Moore tops his list of 2026 NFL draft prospects . it's time to debut my rankings of the best prospects in the class . the list below is based on film study and conversations with scouts and evaluators .

title: UFC 323 expert picks, best bets: Can Merab or Pantoja be stopped?
content: merab Dvalishvili will defend his bantamweight title for the fourth time this year . the nine-year veteran from the country of Georgia is taking on former champion Petr Yan . if he gets his hand raised for the 15th consecutive time on Saturday, he'll become the first UFC fighter to win four title fights in a calendar year. pound-for-pound competitor, Alexandre Pantoja (30-5), puts his men's flyweight belt on the line in the co-

title: ACC/SEC Challenge guide: The best games, from Duke, Arkansas, more
content: the 2025 ACC/SEC Men's Challenge featured a bevy of AP top 25 men's college basketball teams . on Tuesday, the ACC came out swinging, with no. 4 Duke escaping an attempted double-digit comeback by no. 15 Florida by a single point . a one-possession victory for no. 16 North Carolina over no. 18 Kentucky ended the night up 6-2 on the SEC .

title: ED files chargesheet against Reliance Power, subsidiaries in 'bogus' bank guarantee case

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks for Week 14
content: this column features score projections, over/unders, win probabilities, and easily digestible fantasy advice for seasonlong leagues and DFS . this guide should help you with all sorts of decision-making, including sit/start, last-minute waiver adds and lineup choices .
